newsitem.title: USA: INSIGHT - U.S. T-bond futures try to work higher.
newsitem.headline: INSIGHT - U.S. T-bond futures try to work higher.

text.p: U.S. Treasury bond futures were making little headway exploring the upside Tuesday as the market kept its sights trained on the recent high of 111-09.
Lingering bullishness from the upside breakout on Friday was expected to continue to underpin prices in the near term, technical analysts said.
"The technicals suggest you want to buy on the dips," said Cia Lallas, analyst with MMS International.
However, September bond futures were having trouble rising above a volume congestion area that has begun to form near 111-00, she noted.
